sqlMap.select: select distinct oup.*,null as advance from zg_t_carplan carplan, zg_t_carbom carbom, zg_t_order_planbom planbom, zg_t_order_plan plan, zg_t_group_order_plan gop , zg_t_order_plan_group oup where carplan.cuid = carbom.car_plan_id and carbom.order_planbom_id = planbom.cuid and planbom.order_plan_id = plan.cuid and plan.cuid=gop.order_plan_id and gop.group_id=oup.cuid and carplan.cuid = '$carPlanId$'
select t.*,null as advance from zg_t_order_plan_group t ,zg_t_group_order_plan gop,zg_t_order_plan plan where plan.cuid='$orderPlanId$' and plan.cuid=gop.order_plan_id and gop.group_id=t.cuid
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ZG_T_ORDER_PLAN_GROUP SET STATE = #state# WHERE CUID = #cuid#
update zg_t_order_plan_group p set p.state=#state# where exists (select 1 from zg_t_group_order_plan op where op.group_id=p.cuid and op.order_plan_id=#planId#)
update zg_t_order_plan t set t.state='$state$' where exists (select 1 from zg_t_group_order_plan gop where gop.order_plan_id=t.cuid and t.state<>'9' and gop.group_id='$groupId$')
UPDATE ZG_T_ORDER_PLAN_GROUP SET indexno = '$indexNo$' WHERE CUID = '$cuid$'

update zg_t_order_plan_group t set t.indexNo = t.indexNo + $moveNum$ where exists (select 1 from zg_t_group_order_plan oup, zg_t_order_plan plan, zg_t_order zto, zg_t_order_aide aide where t.cuid = oup.group_id and oup.order_plan_id = plan.cuid and plan.order_id = zto.cuid and zto.cuid=aide.order_id and plan.plan_type = '$sorft$'
and plan.plant='$plant$' and plan.state<>'-1'
and t.indexNo > $indexNo$)
sqlMap.select:
select t.*,null as advance from zg_t_order_plan_group t, zg_t_group_order_plan oup, zg_t_order_plan plan, zg_t_order zto where t.cuid = oup.group_id and oup.order_plan_id = plan.cuid and plan.order_id = zto.cuid and plan.plan_type = '$sorft$' and trunc(zto.pcdat) = to_date('$date$', 'yyyy-mm-dd')
and zto.arbpl = '$arbpl$'
and t.psbh = $psbh$
sqlMap.update: update zg_t_order_plan_group t set t.label_cn='$labelCn$' where t.cuid='$cuid$'
sqlMap.select:
select * from (( select oup.*,min(zto.arbpl) arbpl,min(aide.px_date) px_date,'0' as advance from
zg_t_virtualorg_employee emp, zg_t_virtualorg vorg, ZG_MATERIEL_VIRTUALORG morg, zg_materiel mat, zg_t_bom bom,
zg_t_orderbom orderbom, zg_t_order_planbom planbom, zg_t_order_plan plan, zg_t_group_order_plan gop, zg_t_order_plan_group oup, zg_t_order zto, zg_t_order_aide aide where zto.cuid=aide.order_id and aide.plant=plan.plant
and vorg.org_id=plan.plant and emp.org_id = vorg.cuid and vorg.cuid = morg.org_id and morg.matkl = mat.id and mat.id = bom.matkl_self and mat.lgort = bom.lgort and bom.idnrk = orderbom.idnrk and bom.car_id is not null and bom.carnum is not null
and plan.order_id=zto.cuid and orderbom.cuid = planbom.order_bom_id and planbom.order_plan_id = plan.cuid and plan.cuid = gop.order_plan_id and gop.group_id = oup.cuid and zto.order_state<>'-1' and zto.freeze<>'4'
and plan.plant='$plant$'
oup.plan_type = '$planType$'
zto.arbpl = '$arbpl$'
and emp.user_id = '$operatorId$'
and zto.freeze='0'
and oup.state in ('0','4') and plan.state in ('0','4') and planbom.state in ('0','4','8') and to_date('$pxDate$','yyyy-MM-dd')>=aide.px_date group by oup.cuid,oup.percent,oup.plan_type,oup.state,oup.psbh,oup.label_cn,oup.indexno
) union ( select oup.*,min(zto.arbpl) arbpl,min(aide.px_date) px_date,'1' as advance from
zg_t_virtualorg_employee emp, zg_t_virtualorg vorg, ZG_MATERIEL_VIRTUALORG morg,
zg_t_orderbom orderbom, zg_t_order_planbom planbom, zg_t_order_plan plan, zg_t_group_order_plan gop, zg_t_order_plan_group oup, zg_t_order zto, zg_t_order_aide aide, zg_t_bom bom, zg_materiel ma
where orderbom.idnrk=bom.idnrk and bom.matkl_self=ma.id and bom.lgort=ma.lgort
and bom.car_id is not null and bom.carnum is not null and zto.cuid=aide.order_id and aide.plant=plan.plant and
vorg.org_id=plan.plant and emp.org_id = vorg.cuid and vorg.cuid = morg.org_id and morg.matkl = ma.id and
plan.order_id=zto.cuid and orderbom.cuid = planbom.order_bom_id and planbom.order_plan_id = plan.cuid and plan.cuid = gop.order_plan_id and gop.group_id = oup.cuid
and zto.order_state<>'-1' and planbom.state='0' and zto.freeze<>'4'
and plan.plant='$plant$'
oup.plan_type = '$planType$'
zto.arbpl = '$arbpl$'
and emp.user_id = '$operatorId$'
and zto.freeze='0'
and oup.state in ('0','4') and plan.state in ('0','4') and planbom.state in ('0','4','8') and aide.px_date>to_date('$pxDate$','yyyy-MM-dd') and ma.advance='1' group by oup.cuid,oup.percent,oup.plan_type,oup.state,oup.psbh,oup.label_cn,oup.indexno
)
) order by INDEXNO ,px_date,arbpl, PSBH

select distinct oup.*, null as advance from zg_t_order_plan_group oup,zg_t_group_order_plan gop, zg_t_order_plan t where gop.order_plan_id = t.cuid and oup.cuid=gop.group_id and t.order_id = '$orderId$'
